description.narrative: By end of 2014, young people, children, the media, local authorities, ci vil society organisations, children and young people are engaged in alli ances for child rights., which contributes to Corporate External Relations And Partnerships, Communication And Resource Mobilization, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Human Rights Institutions, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By end of 2014, responsible government institutions prioritise investmen ts for childrenÂ´s rights, social protection and inclusion programmes, wi th the participation of civil society, children and young people.
